patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Security Patch Needed
patch.message:
The site is running 5.36.0. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.36.1 (security) (2021-04-21): Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2021-08.

upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Security Upgrade Needed
upgrade.message:
CiviCRM 5.36 has reached its end of life. Security updates are not provided anymore. Please upgrade to the latest stable release (5.58) or an extended security release (5.57).

Release history

5.38.0 was released on 2021-06-02. The latest patch revision is 5.38.1 (2021-06-30).
